thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Christine
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text:
My experience with David Sklar & Associates Inc has been a positive one so far. The lawyer that was assigned to me is friendly and professional.
She was very helpful and straight forward. Giving me clear information that I need and did not over complicate the process.
I am happy with my experience with Ms. Ashley Carter, she is pretty cool and reliable.
Thank you,
Christine
